howToConnect.title: How to connect SENSIBLE+ with dashboard?
steps: Click on the Settings icon and select Wi-Fi option.
Enter the required details and connect the device with Wi-Fi.
Keep Your Device on Graph Screen by pressing the touch button.
Download AQI India app and sign up.
Click Add Device and choose the Sensible+ monitor out of the options given.
Enter the Device ID or scan the QR code from the device screen.

downloadSection.heading: To get the updates about Air Quality near you, Download AQI App
downloadSection.description: To track the quality of air you inhale, download the AQI app on your iOS/Android device(s) and forget all your worries. Download the app via Google Play Store (for Android), or Apple App Store (for iOS).

tvAppSection.title: Download AQI TV App
tvAppSection.description: Install our app in your smart TV, and connect your monitors to display air quality data on your television sets 24*7.
tvAppSection.appImageAlt: air quality data on aqi tv app

historicalData.title: Real-time & Historical Data
historicalData.description: Access your city's data on real-time or historic air pollution parameters like AQI, PM2.5, PM10, Temperature, Humidity & Noise parameters anytime, anywhere.

healthRecommendations.title: Health Recommendations
healthRecommendations.description: Get health recommendations according to the current air quality. These will be particularly helpful to you on the days with high pollution levels.

scanQR.title: Generate a Link/Scan the QR
scanQR.description: Share the live monitoring data externally by generating a link or a QR code.

comprehensiveData.title: Comprehensive Air Quality Data
comprehensiveData.description: Place AQI India widget on your home screen to view AQI information on the go.

reliableDashboard.title: Reliable Dashboard
reliableDashboard.description: Log in to our exclusive AQI dashboard with your credentials for a reliable experience.

exportData.title: Export Data
exportData.description: Export the air quality data of your device(s) in an Excel Sheet format for future reference.

multipleDevices.title: Convergence of Multiple Devices at one place
multipleDevices.description: Pair one or multiple Prana Air – Air Pollution Monitors with the dashboard through WiFi/GSM SIM connectivity.

graphicalRepresentation.title: Graphical Representation for Comparative Ease
graphicalRepresentation.description: Get graphical representation of air quality data for your ease. Also, you can compare multiple data and make inferences.

qrCodeSection.title: Check Your Air Pollution Data By Scan QR Code
qrCodeSection.altText: check air pollution by qr code scan

questions.q1: 1. Which air quality parameters can be monitored by SENSIBLE+ ?
questions.q2: 2. Is SENSIBLE+ monitor competent as per the international standards?
questions.q3: 3. Can I connect my device with Wi-Fi?
questions.q4: 4. Do I get any on-board storage with SENSIBLE+ ?
questions.q5: 5. Can I connect my SENSIBLE+ with my Building Management System (BMS)?
questions.q6: 6. How much does SENSIBLE+ monitor weigh?

answers.a1: SENSIBLE+ is an indoor air quality monitor that effectively measures a wide range of primary and secondary air pollutants. It monitors and gives user the account of Air Quality Index (AQI), Temperature, Relative Humidity, PM (10, 2.5, and 1), CO₂, and Total Volatile Organic Compounds (TVOCs) in the air around them.
answers.a2: Yes. It has been curated with cutting edge technology, keeping national and international requirements in mind. SENSIBLE+ is compliant with the standards set by WELL, LEED, ISHRAE and WHO.
answers.a3: Yes. SENSIBLE+ comes with Wi-Fi connectivity. You can connect your device with the Wi-Fi of your place by accessing the Settings menu.
answers.a4: Yes. SENSIBLE+ comes with on-board micro-SD card storage.
answers.a5: Yes, absolutely. SENSIBLE+ air quality monitor is extremely versatile and flexible in terms of connectivity. It comes with RS-485 connectivity which renders it compatible with your BMS.
